mapper.insert: insert into review( pid, title, contents, editor ) values( #{pid}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{editor} )
mapper.select: select seqid, pid, title, contents, editor, intime, expyn from review where pid = #{pid}
select seqid, pid, title, contents, editor, intime, expyn from review where pid = #{pid} and seqid > #{seqid} limit 3;
